messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, Being born and educated locally I want to see Bedford achieve its true potential as our county town...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS by stopping our EU membership fee, clawing back the £30 million a day paid out on foreign aid.

mentions.candidate: Charlie Smith is committed to defending and nurturing the NHS. Ensuring the survival of Bedford Hospital would be my first priority as your Bedford MP.

issues.brexitEurope: Stopping our EU membership fee, clawing back the £30 million a day paid out on foreign aid.
issues.economy: A fairer tax system, invest in Jobs and housing.
issues.education: Want Bedford to be a town of opportunity for young people, in education, jobs and housing.
issues.health: The NHS is one of Britain’s greatest assets. UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS.
issues.immigration: Control our borders with a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system.

leaflet.personalStatement: Being born and educated locally I want to see Bedford achieve its true potential as our county town...

politicalExperience.duration: First priority as your Bedford MP.

contactInformation.address: UK Independence Party, Promoted by Ginnie Clifton-Smith on behalf of Charlie Smith, HOUSE, 42A STAGSDEN ROAD, BROMHAM, BEDFORD. MK43 8PT. UK Independence Party, Unit 4b Prospect Place, Millennium Court, Foxhunter Drive, Park Lane, Oldbury B69 4JX.
